meanings.definition: The position or office of a councillor.
meanings.sent1: She was proud to hold one of the councillorships in her town.
meanings.sent2: The councillorships in the city council were highly sought after.
meanings.sent3: The councillorships seemed to come with endless meetings and paperwork.
meanings.sent4: In the world of local politics, councillorships were like badges of honor.
meanings.sent5: The responsibilities of councillorships weighed heavily on her shoulders.

meanings.definition: The term of office of a councillor.
meanings.sent1: His councillorship was marked by significant improvements in the community.
meanings.sent2: The councillorship of the mayor lasted for four years.
meanings.sent3: During his councillorship, he implemented many positive changes.
meanings.sent4: The councillorship of the previous leader set a high standard for the role.
meanings.sent5: The councillorship brought both challenges and rewards to those who held it.
